Add API endpoint for go pkg

entry.title: New release for SheetAble: v0.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Implement email functionalities @vallezw in https://github.com/SheetAble/SheetAble/pull/36
  • Add forgot password functions

Full Changelog: https://github.com/SheetAble/SheetAble/compare/v0.6.5...v0.7

entry.title: New release for SheetAble: v0.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bug fix: 29-check-wrong-password-msg by @vallezw in https://github.com/SheetAble/SheetAble/pull/39
  • Bug fix: 34 pull new version bug by @vallezw in https://github.com/SheetAble/SheetAble/pull/38
  • Build Linux ARM Binaries by @jj-style in https://github.com/SheetAble/SheetAble/pull/43
  • Feature implementation: 26-user-management-in-settings by @vallezw in https://github.com/SheetAble/SheetAble/pull/40
  • Docker metadata build by @vallezw in https://github.com/SheetAble/SheetAble/pull/48

Full Changelog: https://github.com/SheetAble/SheetAble/compare/v0.7...v0.8

entry.title: New release for SheetAble: v0.8.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix all eslint warning by @Sambalicious in https://github.com/SheetAble/SheetAble/pull/54
  • Fix non latin names bug by @vallezw in https://github.com/SheetAble/SheetAble/pull/56
  • Downgrade Ubuntu version in action by @vallezw
  • Upgrade go version to 1.19 by @vallezw

New Contributors

  • @Sambalicious made their first contribution in https://github.com/SheetAble/SheetAble/pull/54

Full Changelog: https://github.com/SheetAble/SheetAble/compare/v0.8...v0.8.1
